mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( acct_id, passwd, real_name, email, phone, creator_id, create_time ) VALUES ( #{user.acctId}, #{user.passwd}, #{user.realName}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone}, #{user.creatorId}, NOW() )
INSERT INTO sys_user_role ( user_id, role_id, creator_id, create_time ) VALUES (#{userId}, #{roleId}, #{creatorId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT u.*,ur.role_id FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_user_role set role_id = #{roleId} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE acct_id = #{acctId} AND passwd = #{passwd}
